entries.answered_all: You're a smart one, you are.  Very smart.  That's good.  I like smart people.
entries.done: Well, you've answered all the questions I have.  Perhaps if you come back another time we can play again.  Who knows, perhaps I'll even have more questions for you then.
entries.not_even_trying: You're not even trying are you?  I sincerely hope not.  Let's just do it again, ok?
entries.you_are_weakest_link: Ugh.  That wrong answer physically pained me.  Perhaps you could try harder?  Or is this really the best you can do?  Well, let's try again shall we?
entries.wrong_squared: You really don't know this material do you?  You should study more.  A weak mind is a terrible thing.  Well, shall we keep going?
entries.wrongest: Of all the answers you could have given, I can't believe you gave that one.  That was very, very wrong.  Again?
entries.worst_answer_ever: I've seen simpletons answer that question better.  It's like you don't have a clue.  So, again?
entries.most_incorrect: No, that is incorrect.  I'm sorry, I thought you'd get that one for sure.  Oh well, another chance?
entries.most_unfortunate: Ah, unfortunately that's not the right answer.  Try again, eh?
entries.bad_answer: Sorry, that's the wrong answer.  I can't believe you didn't know that!  Well, shall we do it again?
entries.most_wrong: No, that's wrong.  Wrong, wrong wrong.  *sigh*  Do you really want to keep guessing?
entries.couldnt_be_wronger: No, you've missed it.  That's not the right answer.  Want another chance?
entries.buzz_wrong_answer: No!  That's not the right answer.  You've missed the question's point it seems, or perhaps you just didn't know any better.  Want to try once more?
entries.incorrect: That's incorrect.  You'll have to try harder.  Shall we try again?
entries.you_are_wrong: You missed that one.  I thought you'd know it.  Again?
entries.no_sir: No.  Wrong.  That's the wrong answer.  Shall we do this again?
entries.thats_not_it: Nope, that's not it.  Would you like to try again?
entries.you_got_it: You got it!  That's the right answer.  Shall we do another?
entries.correctamundo: You definitely know your stuff.  Try again?
entries.correct: Correct!  You're very smart.  Another question?
entries.good_answer: Very good.  You got it.  Would you like another question?
entries.you_are_right: That's the correct answer.  Very good job.  Would you like another question?
entries.worst_ever_guesser: You're just guessing aren't you?  And not even very well at that.  Ah, well.   Try again?
entries.too_bad_so_sad: Oh, that's not right.  Would you like to try again?
entries.winner_is_you: Excellent.  You got that correct.  Would you like another question?
entries.question_20: The playwright Thalos Lorin, is best known for this drama:
entries.question_19: The T-I-E in TIE Fighters is most commonly believed to refer to what?
entries.question_18: What is the more common name of the Koensayr BTL Longprobe Starfighter?
entries.question_17: sport of the New Order, shortly before the Battle of Yavin?
entries.question_16: What song, performed by the ensemble Plexo-33, was considered the most popular song in the galaxy, prior to the Clone Wars?
entries.question_15: What song, written and performed by the band Starburst, was rated Scarlet (artistically worthless and offensive) by the Imperial Board of Culture?
entries.wrong_two_14: The Queen of Air and Darkness.
entries.question_14: Which of the following is not considered a
entries.question_13: The four suits of a standard Sabacc deck are:
entries.question_12: What company developed the original Victory Class Star Destroyers for the Old Republic?
entries.question_11: Who formed the Brotherhood of the Sith?
entries.question_10: How many inhabitable moons does Yavin have?
entries.question_9: How many moons orbit the planet Endor?
entries.question_8: Where did the Trade Federation first test the automata of its vast droid army?
entries.question_7: In what system is the planet Dathomir located?
entries.question_6: How long is an average day on Dantooine?
entries.question_5: Rori is a moon which orbits which planet?
entries.question_4: Approximately how many light years is Tatooine from the Galactic Core?
entries.question_3: What single center of mass do both Talus and Tralus orbit around?
entries.question_2: Corellian Clams are known for this property...
entries.question_1: Who originally established the Free Trader Association of Naboo?
entries.good_bye: Well, I hope you enjoyed your visit.  I hope to see you again very soon.
entries.want_trivia: Hello, welcome to the library.  If you'd like, we could play a game.  I'll ask you trivia questions and you can answer them.  All right?
